description: Converts a track overall stats file created by tracula into a table used for group statistics.

load_pathstats_from_file.title: Load pathstats from file
load_pathstats_from_file.description: Name of the file which has the list of subjects (one subject per line).

overall.title: Overall flag
overall.description: Operate on the overall path statistics.

byvoxel.title: Byvoxel flag
byvoxel.description: Operate on the byvoxel path statistics.

byvoxel_measure.title: Byvoxel measure
byvoxel_measure.description: Specify byvoxel measure. One of [AD, RD, MD, FA]. Required with --byvoxel option.

delimiter.title: Delimiter
delimiter.description: Delimiter between measures in the table. Default is tab (alt comma, space, semicolon).

transpose.title: Transpose flag
transpose.description: Transpose the table (default is subject in rows and measures/count in cols).
